price: Dan mereka selalu diikuti dengan kutukan di dunia ini dan (begitu pula) di hari kiamat.  Ingatlah, sesungguhnya kaum ‘Ād itu kafir kepada Tuhan mereka. Ingatlah kebinasaanlah bagi kaum  ‘Ād, (yaitu) kaum Hūd itu.
arabic: وَأُتۡبِعُواْ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ عَادٗا كَفَرُواْ رَبَّهُمۡۗ أَلَا بُعۡدٗا لِّعَادٖ قَوۡمِ هُودٖ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'biʿū fī hādhihi al-dun'yā laʿnatan wayawma al-qiyāmati alā inna ʿādan kafarū rabbahum alā buʿ'dan liʿādin qawmi hūdin
